text:
With the CMS free that was launched, was the marketplace updated?
I notice the same error as we had in feb that the theme could not be downloaded because of a CTA
We updated our theme, it was downloadable on a starter until last week
now a CMS starter can not buy it anymore
“This theme requires access to the CTA tool.” << which is incorrect
Are you on HubSpot Starter? Starters doesnt have CTAs, so if a theme has a module with a CTA field you cant download it
